wikipedia_page.main:
Christopher Trudgeon (born 17 June 1951) is an English former cricketer. He was a right-handed batsman who played for Cornwall. He was born in St Austell, Cornwall, UK.
Trudgeon made his only List A appearance for the side during the 1980 season, against Devon. From the upper-middle order, he scored 9 runs.Trudgeon played for Cornwall in the Minor Counties Championship between 1981 and 1987.
